name: Company Calamity
description: My entry for Ludum Dare 50, with the theme of Delay the inevitable. My take on this theme was to defend your position of CEO at a corporation against a group of board members who want you gone. This is my first real attempt at creating a game at all and having to do everything in 72 hours was a real challenge but I've managed to make something that is at least a proof of concept and clearly portrays my take on the theme.
